refnamediv.refpurpose: Clears an audio output channel of the named software bus.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Clears an audio channel of the named software bus to zero. Implies declaring the channel with imode=2 (see also chn_a).

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Sname -- a string that indicates which named channel of the software bus to clear.
